alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:21PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Edgefield, northwestern Aiken and south central Saluda Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Belvedere, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Edgefield, Saluda, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Saluda County Airport, Edgefield County Airport, Monetta, Trenton, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Harmony, Murphys Estates, Mt Vintage, Vaucluse, Edgefield Federal Correction Institution and Murphy Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 6 and 21. Interstate 520 in South Carolina near mile marker 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
